name: Midnight Monorail
description:
Our submission to the GMTK 2020 Jam.

Welcome conductor, to the MIDNIGHT MONORAIL! It looks like you'll be stuck with the graveyard shift...

Build the tracks necessary to transport passengers to their stations. But watch out! Although you are able to build the tracks, trains will spawn out of your control, so it's your job to make sure they don't collide by using your ghostly abilities, letting them phase through one another!

After 10 collisions it's GAME OVER! How high of a score can you get?

CONTROLS:

  • Click to place tracks during build mode
  • Click on trains to make them incorporeal for a second to avoid collisions.
